oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Special Executive Council Meeting Report, 1953
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Report Executive council meeting regarding Highlander's change of direction to focus on segregation in southern schools. The report includes plans ready for enaction once the decision in Brown v. Board of Education is announced.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Segregation in education; Civil rights; Discrimination; Discrimination in education; Discrimination in employment; Discrimination in housing; African Americans--Civil rights--History--20th century; National Association for the Advancement of Colored People; United Packinghouse Workers of America; Segregation--Law and legislation; Civil rights--United States--Cases; State boards of education
